channel.title: Need some help on adding a shop
channel.description:
ok, how can i make a NPC and than when click trade make him open a trade window? please help :)
i really need this, i have tried to find this for days and almost week now, so please guys, i would appreciate if you can just take a little bit of time to explain to me, than i will greatly appreciate it, thanks again.
~flargie~
